its not about replacing older gear... its about making use of the older gear still

one can connect a i7 laptop to bigscreen afterall

Keep the old gear and get a piece of new gear.

HD TV Media Players plug into the TV, connect to your network, and play anything on your PC.

You can get a decent one for around $50.

I just don't get what the freaking fuss is about going to avc/aac mp4.  There are so many devices that support it and if you don't have one they aren't at all expensive to purchase.  Some of those media players probably cost the same or less today than that DVD player bought a decade ago.
